params._validator: Address of the validator to add

constructor.details: Constructor adds the contract deployer as the first validator

getCampaignProofs(uint256).details: Get all proofs associated with a campaign

returns._0: Proof struct containing all proof details

getProofAmount(bytes32).details: Get the amount of funds requested in a proof

getProofCampaign(bytes32).details: Get the campaign ID associated with a proof

getProofStatus(bytes32).details: Get the current status of a proof

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Pause the contract Only owner can pause the contract

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._validator: Address of the validator to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setProofStatus(bytes32,uint8).details: Set the status of a proof

params._status: New status code Only validators can change proof status

params._description: Description of how funds were/will be used
params._ipfsHash: IPFS hash of the proof documents

returns._0: The ID of the created proof NGOs call this to submit evidence for fund requests or usage reports

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Unpause the contract Only owner can unpause the contract
